title: I Rock
overview: Maybe it's just me, but aren't great music and hot sex just made to go together?  Unlike most girls in the biz, I've never really stripped before. Boy, did he give me a nice pounding! I loved it so much, my sweet little flower could barely keep up...but you'll have to watch the behind the scenes for that!  Then there's the scene when I was rocking out, playing the guitar, and I kinda got distracted and started rubbing the guitar on my clit. Oopsy daisy! Barry Scott climbed on the pool table with me and we went wild. Fucking on a pool table can be so uncomfortable, but I didn't mind. I was too busy enjoying his cock...and the music...to notice. Anyways, I hope you all enjoy i-Rock as much as I enjoyed making it! Later, baby! - Stefani
